structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Operation Of Dental Office Under Name Of Owner; Exception
law.text: No corporation hereinafter formed or organized shall conduct a dental office and no person shall conduct a dental office under any name other than that of the dentist actually owning the practice. The provisions of statute shall not apply to a professional corporation organized to practice dentistry under chapter one hundred and fifty-six A.
